Name: The Longest Dungeon
About the game: The Longest Dungeon is a story-less game in which you play as a character stuck in the dungeon. You fight enemies with your 3 moves, Explosive Dash, Shockwave, and a sword. You fight off enemies in a procedurally selected dungeon. The Longest Dungeon is made for replayability with no story and different dungeons each time. Receive upgrades from killing bosses and gain health from killing basic enemies. It has a simple pixel art style while incorporating a cartoony animation style.
